data.title: Pistachi-Ooh Latte
data.description: I love the variety of drinks offered by Just-In Joy Coffee Co. The flavors are unique and always fresh. My favorite is the Pistachi-Ooh Latte!
data.name: Lloyd

data.title: Americano
data.description: I love the smooth blend of the coffee. It tasted as though it had milk and cream in it, but it did not. The best American I have ever had!
data.name: Melissa

data.title: Lavendar Latte
data.description: I love the delicious latte's that Just-In Joy Coffee Co have to offer. You can get one of a kind drinks and the service is amazing. My favorite is the Lavendar Latte!
data.name: Alana

data.title: El Gozo
data.description: This was absolutely my favorite of the many favotites! I nicknamed it 'cinco de cinco' because it was definitely a 'five out of five!' The best way to describe it is a party in your mouth.  With hints of chocolate and cinnamon and just pure deliciousness... trust me... try it!
data.name: Tara
